the Owls only shot  percent from the field PERIOD

Junior Ronald Delph scored  points to go along with six rebounds in the Owls loss to UAB PERIOD Photo by Mohammed F PERIOD Emran

Hans Belot Jr. Sports EditorMarch  

Florida Atlantic mens basketball was unable to overcome a tough shooting night in Birmingham Alabama on Thursday night falling  to the University of AlabamaBirmingham PERIOD

The Owls   Conference USA shot  percent from the field for the game including just 6of24 from threepoint territory PERIOD Senior Adonis Filer led the Owls with  points on 5of10 shooting PERIOD

FAU started the game just 4of12 from the field and found itself in a 14point deficit in the first eight minutes of the game PERIOD However after trailing by  points with  left in the first half the Owls went on an  run over the next three minutes cutting the lead to  PERIOD

FAU would eventually trail  heading into the locker room PERIOD Filer had  points on 4of5 shooting to lead the Owls at the break PERIOD

The Owls were never able to get closer to nine points in the second half PERIOD UAB closed the game on a  run PERIOD

Blazers junior Chris Cokley led all scorers with  points on 8of11 shooting PERIOD UAB shot  percent from the field for the game PERIOD

FAU will close out its season at Middle Tennessee on Saturday March  at  p.m PERIOD at the Murphy Center in Murfreesboro Tennessee PERIOD

Hans Belot Jr PERIOD is the sports editor of the University Press PERIOD For information regarding this or other stories email emailprotected or tweet him at DonPhenom PERIOD
